Interface IOntologyHandle

public interface IOntologyHandle

Method Detail

getStream

java.io.InputStream getStream()
Returns an InputStream by which the content of the ontology can be read to be parsed by an RDF parser or other ontology parsing tools.

Returns:
InputStream for the ontology. Should be closed at the end, but also cannot be used more than once. To read the ontology again, this method must be called again.

getRdf

java.lang.String getRdf()
Returns a String that contains the entire ontology RDF secription in RDF/XML format.

Returns:
String containing the ontology in XML/RDF format.

getDependencies

java.util.Collection<IOntologyHandle> getDependencies()
An ontology may depend on other ontologies (such as via includes). The list of all these dependent ontologies is returned in a Collection, which may be empty if no dependencies exist.
This method does not do an exhaustive traversal of the dependencies tree recursively.

Returns:
A Collection of directly dependent ontologies of the present ontology.

getBaseNS

java.lang.String getBaseNS()

getVersionIRI

java.lang.String getVersionIRI()
